state.text: Highly imperiled, yes.
Nothing useful: flowers. A sweater. The likes.
Oh, small things. Golden flowers. A sweater.
I'd made a sweater, long ago. I enjoyed tending to golden flowers from the surface, too.
Yes, I imagine you would not.
Should you have?

case.state: I would have been most surprised if you had expected it.

state.text: Did you hear `demon' and think `succubus' instead?
Entice. I am no common succubus, Nicole. My demonic nature is far different.
Should I? Demon I may be, but that does not mean I am some succubus.
Hee hee! Oh, I am certain ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ is.

case.state: Undoubtedly. However, ~player~'s intent aside, I have my own agenda: victory.

state.text: Certainly possible. But whatever ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ reasons for calling me here, I am here to win.
I could not tell.
I am not some wish-granting genie, Nicole.
Forgive me for not being inclined to take your advice.
... as for that, I do not object on principle...
... though as for that, I do not mind the idea...
... now that, though, I would not necessarily be averse to.
Oh, do not give ~player~ any illusions of being in control, Nicole.
Nicole, I do believe you are mistaken as to which of us is in control...
Understand this, Nicole; between the two of us only one is in control. And it is not ~player~...
~human.ifMale(His|Her)~ current vessel is rather easy on the eyes, I admit. But victory comes first.
Well, I will not lie. ~Player~'s avatar is quite attractive.
~Player~'s vessel does bestir me, it is true. But destroying the enemy is always the priority.
Words are just words. I would much prefer action.
I would much prefer the real thing, Nicole.

case.state: Sweet nothings are just that; nothing. An actual attack on the enemy, however...

state.text: Oh, I did not say I object to the idea...
I am not dismissing the notion out of hand, mind you...
I would not go quite that far, Nicole...

case.state: ... and it is not something I dispense like candy to nosy humans.

state.text: ... what of it? My family was loving to a fault, but they made the fatal mistake of being ~player~'s enemies.
... what would you have me say? My family was loving, but they got in mine and ~player~'s way, so they had to go.
It is the only sensible compass. Every action and desire needs power to be made reality. All else is secondary.
Everything stems from power. You cannot act without it, Nicole; as such, everything else is of lower priority.
Should it be otherwise? No notions of morality can be fulfilled without the ability to see your convictions through.

case.state: Whichever do you think?

state.text: You tell me, Nicole.
Who can tell? With ~player~ involved it may well go either way...

case.state: Think what you like.
You can think whatever you wish, Raynor.
It matters not what you think, Raynor.
Very astute, Komi.
How very observant of you, Komi.
Whatever gave it away, Komi? Hee hee.

condition.saying: this is just a friendly game of cards.

case.state: You hold cards in your hand and have yet to forfeit, no? And I am here for triumph, not idle chatter about music.
Music? Sakura, I've no intention on focusing on such matters so long as you are still in the game.
`Friendly game of cards,' you say, as if that excuses you. No, I will give my all to bringing you down. There is nothing else to say.

condition.saying: that's... one way of looking

case.state: Indeed it is. I believe you will find I have a different perspective of these events than you.
It is the only way of looking at it.
Hmm. Well, I think I have a rather different view of things than you, Sakura.

condition.saying: care what you look like

case.state: ... or, consider perhaps that that is not exclusively a human attribute.
That is far from being solely a `human' thing, Sakura.
If anything, it is proof that such concern is not only the realm of humans, Sakura.

condition.saying: for war turnin' into casualties anyway

case.state: Since when does what people ask for factor into things?
What background nobodies `ask for' has never been relevant.

condition.saying: gotta look out for the little guys

case.state: Does someone?
That is precisely it. Nobody has to, Raynor.

condition.saying: care about those people

case.state: Hmm. You say that as if that is a good thing.

The humans of my world did, of course, using a magic spell.
Who else but the humans of the world, using magic?
They were sealed by human wizards. Who else, Cynthia?

condition.saying: you appear to be the prime example of that

case.state: Yes, undoubtedly you will.
I am certain you will.

condition.saying: have more friends

case.state: As if I would ever find camaraderie with them.
Hee hee. No, Jura. They would be competition.

condition.saying: suddenly the Earthlings

case.state: Exactly.
Oh, this is hardly about you, Raynor. You just happen to be the next enemy.
This isn't something happening specifically to you, Raynor. You are just the latest in a long line of enemies.
Oh, I've no animosity directed at you. You are simply ~player~'s chosen enemy.

condition.saying: Whatever you say, Chara. I can't believe ~player~ is trying to impress us with a girlfriend!

case.state: If you have made up your mind, then why did you ask?
Except that is hardly the case. The fact that we are not in a manga should be evidence enough for you.
`Manga plot', you say. But I assure that, that is far from the case...

condition.saying: (~Player~? What the hell? Can you get her to dial it back? I get it! It's fine. I... s-sure... I guess.)

case.state: ... such as ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ ruthless dedication to defeating any enemies we come across. Like you.
... for instance, ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ patience and willingness to become as strong as possible before we kill an enemy.
... like when ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ comes across a foe and kills it effortlessly.

condition.saying: ...H-Hey! ~Player~? You're not just going to stand there--

case.state: You wish for ~player~ to defend you? And yet here we have been trying to beat you.
Plead all you like, Natsuki. You will find no mercy.
I'm just what, Natsuki? I am your enemy.

condition.saying: You want to control or "kill" things because you're afraid nobody loves you for you, so you lash out, right?

case.state: No, Natsuki. Not right.
I `lash out' because it is what I am. Would you try to psychoanalyze why gravity makes objects attract one another?
If you are quite done? No, Natsuki. I do what I do because I enjoy it. Because I am it.

condition.saying: Personality isn't like an ingredient. It's a flavor by itself.

case.state: You ought to be more careful of who you tell to `enjoy themselves'.
Focus that advice inward, Natsuki. I've no use for it.

condition.saying: Personality isn't like an ingredient. It's a flavor by itself.

case.state: Believe me, Natsuki, I certainly am.

condition.saying: Personality isn't like an ingredient. It's a flavor by itself.

case.state: How can I `enjoy myself' when I am losing?
Oh? Are belts such a rarity in your world, then?
Really? And what about me gives you that idea?
Brock, plenty of people wear belts underneath their shirts.
You find difficulty in interesting places, I see. Shirt over belt is not uncommon.
Think instead along the lines of `time travel'.
Hmm, not quite, Brock. The closest thing to it would be `time travel'.
Oh, you've no sense of humor.
Tch. Humor is lost on you, Brock.
It cames as such when it was given to me, long ago.
Why not? That is the design it came with, when I first received it.
It was simple. I merely took my knife, and I struck.
Oh, this place would be fine.
I've not fought often, but I prefer to be simple and direct. A quick, hard slash, many times more powerful than what is needed to kill.
What a coincidence. I would very much like the same for you, as well.
Now you are beginning to understand, Perona.
Is that so? I feel the same way, Perona.
Oh, far from it. All he could hope to do was irritate and disuade ~player~. But he failed, and I was reborn.
He did not come close. ~Player~'s determination saw us through, and so I finished my reincarnation.
For a moment, I did. I'd thought the monsters worthy of sacrificing my life. But no; they were only ever meant to be enemies.
Think again. In life I'd thought that the kingdom and its people were worth my life. But it turns out, they were only ever fuel for my ascension.
Oh, I am well aware. Do not worry; he will die too.
`Amon' has been marked as an enemy. He, too, will be destroyed.
Hee hee. I'm sure.
Is that so? I remain unconvinced.
I know what all is out there, Raynor. There is nobody.
Oh, it is much too late for that. ~human.ifMale(He|She)~ let me into ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ heart, and that cannot be undone.
Oh, ~player~ could not be rid of me if ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ tried. ~human.ifMale(He|She)~ made ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ choice long, long ago.
~Player~ embraced power and gave me ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ very soul. This is not something that can be reversed, Raynor.
You'll find there are many more great powers than just Arceus out there. Take my word for it; I know quite a bit about power.
Arceus is hardly the only world-creating power there is. I would know; power is within my sphere of influence.
Oh, I am `misunderstanding' nothing. It is you who is missing a piece of the puzzle.
I assure you, I understand the situation perfectly. The same cannot be said of you.
No such `split' happened, Stella. It is you who has failed to glean what is happening.
Suffering and power do not actually correlate. How much did you suffer to gain your power, then?
Is that so? Am I to take it that means you went through great hardship to acquire your abilities, Perona?
It means no such thing. It goes not in reverse, either; or do you wish to tell me of how difficult it was for you to gain your power?
She expected that to work, partner! Hee hee.
Amusing, is it not, partner? She thought she was in control here.
She seems rather surprised. She thought that would have an effect, ~player~, hee hee.
Oh? Extreme? When it came to killing within the Underground, I found him downright accommodating.
You say `extreme' but he was quite useful when ~player~ started killing within the Underground.
I beg to differ. He was eager to help ~player~ and me eradicate the Underground's inhabitents.
Very much business, Yuri.
Professional is a good word for it, Yuri.
It's all business, Yuri, rest assured.
Oh, I know. But I see no reason to be too on the nose. Right, partner?
I assure you, Stella; I know. But I'd rather not be too direct about this around ~player~.
It is something I know very well. But there is no reason to simply say it directly. Wouldn't you agree, ~player~?
I'm sure.
No doubt.
Trust me when I say it is not so horrible, Nami.
Oh, having your soul exposed is not so horrible on its own.
The monsters never meant anything by it, in my time. It is not an awful experience.
Even if there were a way to get my soul back, I would not wish it.
Nami, I would not seek to regain my soul even if I could.
The `reason' is for victory, for power.
Why not? It is its own goal, dependent on nothing.
There does not need to be much reason. Humans went to war with them, and the humans won.
The monsters did nothing but lose their war with humanity. That was crime enough, in their eyes.
The monsters possessed a power humans could not tolerate. That was all the excuse humanity needed to wage, and win, war.
What is there to say? They were, and I loved them very much, till things went awry.
Yes, Yuri. They... were.
They were indeed. I would have done, did do, anything for them.

case.state: ... thank you, I suppose.

Hee hee, practice is indeed a great way to improve a skill.
If you talk more to others, then that should come as no surprise.
Yes, clearly you have.
If you are offering, fox spirit, I will not turn you away.
Well, I for one will not turn down a chance to make use of you, Senko.
Victory is its own reward. But there are ways I could make use of you and your services, yes.
Believe you me, I am very focused on it.
Our bond of soul and victory and strength. I assure you, demigod, I am most devoted to our `bond'.
I hardly feel I have sacrificed anything at all, Senko.
What did I sacrifice, fox spirit? ~Player~ had the power to save the entire Underground... but instead, ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ saved me.

condition.saying: you think I'm kidding
You wanna see me prove it

case.state: I've no doubt as to your marksmanship, Colt.
I can sense your accuracy statistic easily, Colt. I am well aware of what you can do in that regards.

Victory is fulfilling, transcendent, meaningful. It is everything I am, the culmination of my being, Sucrose.
Not so much a sexual sense, Sucrose. It is... all-encompassing. The meaning of my existence, the ultimate purpose of being.
I do not mind the view, but it is a separate matter. No, Sucrose, victory is its own reward. Self-contained, absolute, sublime in every way.
A force indeed. How do you plan to remove the desire for power from existence?
Kindly step off your pedestal, Fina. And kindly dispense with the empty threats, too.
Oh? Must be stopped? And how do you propose that?
Yes, it was a rather unique event, Fina. Nobody else could have done it but ~player~.
What can I say, Fina? ~Player~ is one of a kind.
Perhaps I will... but then again, perhaps not, Y'shtola.
Should I take your threats seriously, then? I know what you are capable of.
If you knew what I know, you would be confident too.
There is nothing to trouble yourself. In this place, all I desire is to see our foes debase themselves.
Cease your worry, Yuri. This place is not so inclined to traditional violence.
Think not to lecture. Consider it above your head, Yuri.
Much more. Near the end I was even able to directly empower ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ avatar, to great heights.
Indeed, there was much to it. Towards the end, I even found myself capable of assuming control of ~player~'s human vessel.
Then how do you plan to subdue me, hmm? Do you think if I lose this game I will melt into a puddle?
And yet you still plan to bring me to heel? How? Do you think my life essence will be struck from my body if I must pleasure myself?
I do not think you will have any chance to quarrel with me afterwards.
Hmm, yes. Once this game ends. How do you imagine that happening?
Hmm, 'capable' indeed.
More than that. Even if ~player~ died outright, ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ could return.
Not just mere danger. A foe named `Sans' killed my partner quite a few times, but each time was for naught.
Indeed, Fina. Matter of fact, even if ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ vessel died outright, that was merely... a delay.
If you care not to listen, Perona... then what are you looking for?
You asked, and yet you choose to disregard the answer. What are you even looking for, here?
Willful ignorance. Why even ask, then?
Hee hee. Oh Fina, that will not go the way you wish it to...
A task easier said than done, Fina, even with the random factor taken into account.
Be as eager as you wish.
... and I am eager to see you fail. But only one of us will get what we desire, and it seems you are beaten to it.
As far as I am concerned, I am already victorious.
But how can I fail, Fina, when I have already won?
What you call an 'ego' is merely me knowing the truth of my nature.
Ego, hmm? I suppose it would seem that way to someone such as... yourself.
I merely know the full glory of my existence, Y'shtola. Something you ought to try sometimes... if you could.
Oh, this is hardly the first time I have accompanied ~player.ifMale(him|her)~.
Well, it is the bargain struck. Call me whenever, and wherever, if ~player.ifMale(he|she)~ pleases.
Yes, this is indeed ~player~'s doing. We are both far beyond your ken.
Then allow me to `stand' for this; everything can be reduced to the act of destruction and defeat.
Then consider this, as you `stand', Yuri; anything and everything you have ever enjoyed can be boiled down to conquest.
I will commit to this principle, then; you've always felt the rush. Even when you think you create, you destroy something else.
There is something to be said for the sweetness of milk, but dark is... pure. Hearty. Healthier, too, when such things mattered to me.
Some. But I... also enjoyed giving gifts to my... family.
For more specialized work, that would be better. But I did not exactly cultivate bramble bushes, Monika.

state.text: Fond as I am of golden flowers, it has to go.
It is a lovely little ornament, but the time has come for me to give up my undefeated streak.
I am glad this outfit had it, but the time has come to be rid of it.

My power showed through this round, and the random factor could not bend my knee.

Here we are.
Out into the light.
Off it goes.

But I think you will find the final half more exciting, ~player~.
Almost as if it was made to come off, hee hee!
Dare I say it was made to slip off?
Quite evident that it was made to be stripped, no?
Good that there is somewhere to swim; you did dress me for the occasion.
It is lovely to see there is somewhere to dive into, even if I shall abstain.
A lovely swimsuit. And somewhere to use it, too.
Nowhere to swim, even if I am dressed for it. Ah well.
There is nowhere to dive into, but that is fine; I'd have abstained anyway.
A lovely swimsuit. A shame there is nowhere to use it.
I will just need to find some other way to become wet...
After all, weaker weapons can be discarded.
It hardly compares to my knife, after all.
Inferior weapons have one place; in the dust.
Here we are. They were not unsteady, but I am glad to be... closer to the goal, hmm?
Not that I had trouble with them, but I am glad to be another layer down.
Let us proceed.
... the gloves are off!
... now, of course, I feel a certain breeze.
... however. Without them, there is a draft down there.
... though this place is breezy, if you understand my meaning.
There... tell me partner, where did you think this tail's end was, hmm?
... and down. Call me the succubus on your shoulder...
Now, partner, what sins of yours shall we indulge?
Much better!
There it goes! Shame it was not made of... satan!
... hmm, splendid...

However. I would much prefer crawling over you at night with it off.
After all, how would I fulfill the look of a temptress without going all the way?
This devil is quite close to sinning...
You have offered me your soul. Now, let us see what else you have, hmm?

case.state: I am happy to give up my undefeated streak for you, partner.
It is no matter for me to give up my undefeated run for you.
It is no trouble for me to lose to you.
Worry not. You shall see plenty more before long.

Patience. You shall see more soon.
Socks. Are those enough to arouse you?

How bawdy; I have shown you my socks!

My shirt is next. Merely wait one more hand.
And there it goes.
Away it goes.
And now I am indecent, hee hee!
Down they go.
Away with them.
Much better.
One left, partner.
So I am bared. One more step, partner...
Finding this enjoyable, ~player~?
Do you find this titillating, hmm?

What I have become, I have no fears of the flesh. Continue the game...
Hmmph. Let us move on, partner.
I will have to do better...

I am certain I will do better from here on.

But this is as far as it goes. I will turn this around.
Naught but significant items remain. I must turn this around.
I have been behind for too long.
... and off it goes.
... and toss it away.
... and discard it.
... there.
... it is done. Unbelievable that I am doing so poorly...
... and there. I have to do better than this.

Is my being in last place funny, ~player~?
Laugh while you all can. I am not finished yet.
Last place with nothing left. I'll show you!
Me, of all people, in last place with nothing left. Laugh while you can.
I may be upon the brink, but I will never stop.

state.text: However, we have more important things to do than indulge in flora.
There is no time to admire it, though. Deal the next hand.

I shall somehow have to be satisifed with taking down the enemy.
It would only be an afterthought, anyhow.

... however, this devil has no need for them.

~Player~ lost?

I am given to understand you used to work on a farm, Raynor?

state.text: Do not worry about losing this hand. I am certain you can land on your feet!

state.text: Tell me Luxanna, have you taken a shine to this game?
